app.name: FSToolBox AHBPROT MOD
app.short_description: A WII FS Swiss Army Knife
app.long_description: This is little yet really usefull utility originally coded by nicksasa and then modified by Lupo96 to use AHBPROT with IOS58. Based on FSToolBox v4beta, may be unstable. You need HBC 1.0.8 or higher to run this!!! Find me (Lupo96) on wiitaly.altervista.org
